info.title: Schema of Azure Communication Services events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure Communication Services events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

recipientCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the target user

transactionId.description: The transaction id will be used as co-relation vector

AcsChatEventBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all chat events

transactionId.description: The transaction id will be used as co-relation vector

AcsChatEventInThreadBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all thread-level chat events

deleteTime.description: The time at which the message was deleted

AcsChatMessageDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageDeleted event.

deleteTime.description: The time at which the message was deleted

AcsChatMessageDeletedInThreadEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageDeletedInThread event.

messageBody.description: The body of the chat message

editTime.description: The time at which the message was edited

AcsChatMessageEditedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageEdited event.

messageBody.description: The body of the chat message

editTime.description: The time at which the message was edited

AcsChatMessageEditedInThreadEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageEditedInThread event.

senderCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the sender

senderDisplayName.description: The display name of the sender

composeTime.description: The original compose time of the message

AcsChatMessageEventBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all chat message events

senderCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the sender

senderDisplayName.description: The display name of the sender

composeTime.description: The original compose time of the message

AcsChatMessageEventInThreadBasePropertie.description: Schema of common properties of all thread-level chat message events

messageBody.description: The body of the chat message

AcsChatMessageReceivedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageReceived event.

messageBody.description: The body of the chat message

AcsChatMessageReceivedInThreadEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatMessageReceivedInThread event.

time.description: The time at which the user was added to the thread

addedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who added the user

participantAdded.description: The details of the user who was added

AcsChatParticipantAddedToThreadEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadParticipantAdded event.

time.description: The time at which the user was added to the thread

addedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who added the user

participantAdded.description: The details of the user who was added

AcsChatParticipantAddedToThreadWithUserE.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatParticipantAddedToThreadWithUser event.

time.description: The time at which the user was removed to the thread

removedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who removed the user

participantRemoved.description: The details of the user who was removed

AcsChatParticipantRemovedFromThreadEvent.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadParticipantRemoved event.

time.description: The time at which the user was removed to the thread

removedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who removed the user

participantRemoved.description: The details of the user who was removed

AcsChatParticipantRemovedFromThreadWithU.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatParticipantRemovedFromThreadWithUser event.

createdByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who created the thread

participants.description: The list of properties of participants who are part of the thread

AcsChatThreadCreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadCreated event.

createdByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who created the thread

participants.description: The list of properties of participants who are part of the thread

AcsChatThreadCreatedWithUserEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadCreatedWithUser event.

deletedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who deleted the thread

deleteTime.description: The deletion time of the thread

AcsChatThreadDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadDeleted event.

createTime.description: The original creation time of the thread

AcsChatThreadEventBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all chat thread events

createTime.description: The original creation time of the thread

AcsChatThreadEventInThreadBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all chat thread events

participantCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user

AcsChatThreadParticipantProperties.description: Schema of the chat thread participant

editedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who updated the thread properties

editTime.description: The time at which the properties of the thread were updated

AcsChatThreadPropertiesUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadPropertiesUpdated event.

editedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who updated the thread properties

editTime.description: The time at which the properties of the thread were updated

AcsChatThreadPropertiesUpdatedPerUserEve.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadPropertiesUpdatedPerUser event.

deletedByCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who deleted the thread

deleteTime.description: The deletion time of the thread

AcsChatThreadWithUserDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.ChatThreadWithUserDeleted event.

documentId.description: The documentId of the recording chunk

index.description: The index of the recording chunk

endReason.description: The reason for ending the recording chunk

metadataLocation.description: The location of the metadata for this chunk

contentLocation.description: The location of the content for this chunk

deleteLocation.description: The location to delete all chunk storage

AcsRecordingChunkInfoProperties.description: Schema for all properties of  Recording Chunk Information.

recordingStorageInfo.description: The details of recording storage information

recordingStartTime.description: The time at which the recording started

recordingContentType.description: The recording content type- AudioVideo, or Audio

recordingChannelType.description: The recording  channel type - Mixed, Unmixed

recordingFormatType.description: The recording format type - Mp4, Mp3, Wav

sessionEndReason.description: The reason for ending recording session

AcsRecordingFileStatusUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.RecordingFileStatusUpdated event.

recordingChunks.description: List of details of recording chunks information

AcsRecordingStorageInfoProperties.description: Schema for all properties of Recording Storage Information.

segmentsSucceeded.description: Number of segments that were successfully delivered

segmentsFailed.description: Number of segments whose delivery failed

AcsSmsDeliveryAttemptProperties.description: Schema for details of a delivery attempt

deliveryAttempts.description: List of details of delivery attempts made

receivedTimestamp.description: The time at which the SMS delivery report was received

AcsSmsDeliveryReportReceivedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.SMSDeliveryReportReceived event.

messageId.description: The identity of the SMS message

from.description: The identity of SMS message sender

to.description: The identity of SMS message receiver

AcsSmsEventBaseProperties.description: Schema of common properties of all SMS events

receivedTimestamp.description: The time at which the SMS was received

AcsSmsReceivedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Communication.SMSReceived event.

userCommunicationIdentifier.description: The communication identifier of the user who was disconnected

AcsUserDisconnectedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for an Microsoft.Communication.UserDisconnected event.

rawId.description: Raw Id of the identifier. Optional in requests, required in responses.

CommunicationIdentifierModel.description: Identifies a participant in Azure Communication services. A participant is, for example, a phone number or an Azure communication user. This model must be interpreted as a union: Apart from rawId, at most one further property may be set.

id.description: The Id of the communication user.

CommunicationUserIdentifierModel.description: A user that got created with an Azure Communication Services resource.

userId.description: The Id of the Microsoft Teams user. If not anonymous, this is the AAD object Id of the user.

isAnonymous.description: True if the Microsoft Teams user is anonymous. By default false if missing.

cloud.description: The cloud that the Microsoft Teams user belongs to. By default 'public' if missing.

value.description: The phone number in E.164 format.
